topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b6bf8663687265aae90500#post_54b6bf8663687265aae90500
-Blimps are lame-

If you wanted to ride in style, and not have to deal with expensive airline tickets or be stuck in a cramped car all-day or for a couple of days, you'd want to ride onboard a train. 
Like this sexy beast.
!http://www.calcoastrails.com/photos/SP/earlyeighties/sp4449_sunsetwhitney.jpg!
And don't get me started on how much I love this particular locomotive in general. I'd need another post to express my thoughts for it.

But since steam-trains are too old fashioned, why not something modern?
!http://www.building-your-model-railroad.com/images/Amtrak.jpg!
!http://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/6/6f/Silver_Meteor_train_97_passing_through_Elizabeth.jpg!

[spoiler]Btw Steam locomotive master train race[/spoiler]
